question: Q1.  Which tag used to create hyperlinks ?
Q2. Why won't this anchor tag work?  <a href=https://www.google.com/>click here</a>.

answers.a: The link is incorrect. it should be ref, not href
answers.b: The URL is missing quotation marks
answers.c: There is no anchor tag in the code
answers.d: The href is missing a closing tag
